title: New Moon
description: The 'dark' side of the moon is facing the Earth durning the New Moon lunar phase.  The Moon is only visible durning this phase durning a solar eclipse.

title: Waxing Crescent
description: Less than half of the Moon is visible.  As the Moon enters the Waxing Crescent phase, the amount of direct sunlight illuminating its surface is increasing.
